chunks.original_latin:
NOTA LECTORIBUS: Hoc opus (Q. Julius Hilarianus - Libellus de Mundi Duratione) translatum est antequam systema textus interlinearis institueretur. Textus interactivi inspectio non adest pro hoc documento. Ad Latinum originalem et translationem Anglicam separatim videndas, quaesumus repository visitas per nexum infra datum.
https://github.com/wryan14/Latin-Patristic-Texts/tree/main/Patrologia_Latina/vol_13/Q.%20Julius%20Hilarianus%20-%20Little%20Book%20on%20the%20Duration%20of%20the%20World
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: NOTE TO READERS: This work (Q. Julius Hilarianus - Little Book on the Duration of the World) was translated before the interactive text system was implemented. The interactive text viewer is unavailable for this document. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit the following repository: GitHub - Q. Julius Hilarianus Repository
